snippet: Bodo Ramelow of the Left Party, which is made up of ex-Communists and former Social Democrats, was installed as governor of the state of Thuringia in the east.
lead_paragraph: Bodo Ramelow of the Left Party, which is made up of ex-Communists and former Social Democrats, was installed as governor of the state of Thuringia in the east.

headline.main: Germany’s Left Party Takes Its First Governor’s Seat
